Activity: Check emails and review QA feedback on the latest build. Sync with @prod-1 on weekly progress.
Finalize any remaining asset integrations and perform a full test of the game build.
Address last-minute bugs or performance issues before the weekend.
Document all changes made during the week and update the project wiki.
Email @qtest-1 to confirm the final build for testing and provide release notes.
Wrap up the week by organizing tasks for next week and setting priorities.
Relax and browse game development forums for inspiration and new techniques.
